thread.title: Ford chases Chinese auto market with Lincoln ramp-up

title: Ford chases Chinese auto market with Lincoln ramp-up
text:
Ford chases Chinese auto market with Lincoln ramp-up 10:32am BST - 02:04 
Ford's premium Lincoln brand plans to build as many as five new vehicles in China by 2022, according to two U.S. sources, in a move to expand sales in the world's largest vehicle market that would also blunt the impact of U.S-China trade spats.
